DataElement.preferredName: Adult Health Behavior Smoking Status Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication of a person's current tobacco and nicotine consumption as well as some indication of smoking history.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human who has reached reproductive age.:Behaviors expressed by individuals to protect, maintain or promote their health status. For example, proper diet, and appropriate exercise are activities perceived to influence health status. Life style is closely associated with health behavior and factors influencing life style are socioeconomic, educational, and cultural._An indication of a person's current tobacco and nicotine consumption as well as some indication of smoking history.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A human who has reached reproductive age.:Behaviors expressed by individuals to protect, maintain or promote their health status. For example, proper diet, and appropriate exercise are activities perceived to influence health status. Life style is closely associated with health behavior and factors influencing life style are socioeconomic, educational, and cultural.

Concepts.definition: An age group comprised of humans who have reached reproductive age.
The actions taken by an individual to maintain, attain, and protect their good health. Health behavior reflects a person's health beliefs.

Property.preferredDefinition: An indication of a person's current tobacco and nicotine consumption as well as some indication of smoking history.

Concepts.definition: An indication of a person's current tobacco and nicotine consumption as well as some indication of smoking history.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: responses to a patient's smoking history

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Past Smoker Stop Greater Than One Year

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Past Smoker Stop Greater Than One Year
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Before the present time.: A person who inhales or has inhaled combustible products of organic material during their lifetime.: Put an end to a state or an activity.: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.: A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.

PermissibleValues.value: I smoked a cigarette today (at least one puff)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking.: Smoke from burning tobacco (cigarettes, cigars, or pipes) and exhaled by a smoker.  Tobacco smoke contains nicotine, a stimulant, and other biologically active chemicals having carcinogenic properties.: The day that includes the present moment, as distinct from yesterday or tomorrow.

Concepts.definition: Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking.

Smoke from burning tobacco (cigarettes, cigars, or pipes) and exhaled by a smoker.  Tobacco smoke contains nicotine, a stimulant, and other biologically active chemicals having carcinogenic properties.
The day that includes the present moment, as distinct from yesterday or tomorrow.

PermissibleValues.value: I have not smoked at least 100 cigarettes in my entire life

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who was not smoking at the time of the interview and has smoked less than 100 cigarettes in their life.

Concepts.definition: A person who has never smoked at the time of the interview or has smoked less than 100 cigarettes in their life.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Don't Know or Remember When Last Smoked a Cigarette

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Don't Know or Remember When Last Smoked a Cigarette
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual doesn't know and/or remember how long it has been since they last smoked a cigarette.

Concepts.longName: Don't Know or Remember When Last Smoked a Cigarette
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual doesn't know and/or remember how long it has been since they last smoked a cigarette.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Last Smoked a Cigarette Between One and Seven Days Ago

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Last Smoked a Cigarette Between One and Seven Days Ago
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that it has been between one and seven days since an individual smoked a cigarette.

Concepts.longName: Last Smoked a Cigarette Between One and Seven Days Ago
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that it has been between one and seven days since an individual smoked a cigarette.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.:A condition or state at a particular time.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

Concepts.definition: The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.
A condition or state at a particular time.
Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
